title: The Baking Challenge
overview: The down-and-out star chef He Xian once despised dim sum. In order to regain everything he lost and make a comeback, he was forced to participate in the "King of Dim Sum" Pastry Competition. To this end, He Xian became a disciple of the "God of Dim Sum", teamed up with talented teammates, embarked on the road of dim sum, studied on the road and tried, passed the test, advanced to the finals with passion and strength, and finally grew into the real "King of Dim Sum".
